error

public double error
Error is used by some methods to store some extra information. Specifically information on how far off the error is in the point.

size

public double size
Size is used to help determine when the points are switched. For our purposes it is the size of the blob the wiimote returns

subtract

public XYZ subtract(XYZ point)
Subtracts the given points from the calling point. Each coordinate of the given point subtracted from each coordinate of the calling point.

Returns:
The result of the subtraction.
